manual.description: Describes SKILL functions that interface with Virtuoso design environment applications. These applications include the graphics editor, database access, design management, and design flow.

topic.text: Identifiers Used to Denote Data Types
Bus Definition and Bit Order Functions
Instance Creation and Retrieval Database Access Functions
External, Strong, and Weak Pin Connections
Row Region Specification Functions (Advanced Nodes Only)
InPlace Cover Obstruction Database Access Functions
Multi-Patterning Technology Database Access Functions (Advanced Nodes Only)
Width Spacing Pattern Database Access Functions (ICADV12.3 Only)
Width Spacing Snap Pattern Def Functions
Attribute Retrieval and Modification Database Access Functions
Attributes of Instances, Instance Headers, and Mosaics
Attributes of Instance Terminals, Pins, and Terminals
Attributes of Bus Definitions, Nets, and Signals
Attributes of Layer Purpose Pairs and Layer Headers
Attributes of Groups, Group Members, and Properties
Multiple Triggers for the Same Event
Adding a PreObjAccess Trigger to ddGetObj
Adding a PreAutoCheckout Trigger to ddAutoCheckout
